events.message: Customer reported a car collision that occurred on 2024-04-28, filing an initial claim for vehicle damage and personal injury.
Claim categorised as Auto Accident due to keywords identified in customer description including car collision and accident details.
An insurance claims agent was assigned to handle the customer's auto accident claim following categorisation.
Customer received official acknowledgement of the claim with an initial outline of the process and expected timelines.
Request sent to customer for accident report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and any police reports available from the incident.
Customer submitted all requested documents including police report, vehicle photos, and medical reports related to the accident injuries.
Investigation team began reviewing submitted documentation and external sources to verify the details of the auto accident circumstances.
Investigation concluded confirming validity of the claim with no discrepancies found in reports or supporting documents.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering vehicle repair costs and medical expense reimbursements.
Customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed satisfaction with the claim handling so far.
Claim officially approved by management following customer acceptance of the proposed settlement offer.
The settlement payment was issued to the customer's bank account as per agreed terms for vehicle and medical expenses.
The claim was closed after successful payment issuance and confirmation of customer satisfaction with the resolution.
All claim records were archived securely in compliance with regulatory requirements for future reference.
